column4: what is the fix for bug #386763, i see like 12 people having same issue, but i dont see a fix, really close to just giving up, move on to another OS
most likely if someone had a fix, they would have posted it.  any patches posted ?
what's the link to the issue ?  I don't actually know all the bug reports in my head.  :p
im not that good with bug reporting, so i donno if there's a patch or not, if there is im not seeing it
